page.title: 14Location of World's End
page.content: World's End is conveniently situated in the middle of a circle of major towns and cities making transport easy. The A34 serves this area facilitating travel to Winchester, Southampton and the South, whereas the M4 leads to London and the West, Swindon, Bristol and South Wales and to the M5. Tourist areas and shopping centres are all easily accessible and provide interesting and enjoyable days out. Here are some distances leading directly to the town from East Ilsley in miles. Bath (45m.), Bristol (60m.), Bournemouth (64m.), Oxford (19m.), London (55m.), Swindon (24m.) and Salisbury (40m.). The motorways and trunk roads make the travelling easy and quick.
